title: cryptogeometryteam
author: cryptogeometryteam
content: Hello! We made a great telegram shilling service with a  Free 24 hours trial 600-800 messages dailyAbout 24 800 messages monthlyYou'll get the dashboard with a list of messages and essential metrics!You will be able to see messages written to bots750 chats in the databaseWe're developing a chat database every day!Our clients' results and screenshots from the dashboard.link - https://imgur.com/a/DtPYqUifor free trial and prices DM in telegram https://t.me/BriceDans

comments.author: GxSTxV
comments.body: I respect the services you are offering but for me i see it as spamming in other projects communities is just making the promoted project looks kind of suspicious and bad. Good potential projects are using better ways for marketing and promoting. Spamming with many messages all over the telegram or Twitter we only bother the community managers and moderator to ban those bot continuously

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: GxSTxV on December 26, 2022, 11:26:35 AMI respect the services you are offering but for me i see it as spamming in other projects communities is just making the promoted project looks kind of suspicious and bad. Good potential projects are using better ways for marketing and promoting. Spamming with many messages all over the telegram or Twitter we only bother the community managers and moderator to ban those bot continuously I don't respect this kind of service this is the kind of service that scammers are using, a good project doesn't need this kind of service its spamming, and I don't support and block groups that add me or I get messages from people or bots about certain projects if a project is serious in promoting their project they can launch a bounty campaign and delegate task to human instead of bots, it's very annoying to see in a legit telegram groups bots that send you random messages about projects that has nothing to do with the groups you are in.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: There is nothing new about what you are doing as I've seen it as early as 2017 during that ICO craze when each and every Telegram group was filled with similar spam and is as effective as ANN thread bumping that we can still see here. Either case, a total waste of money.Quote from: GxSTxV on December 26, 2022, 11:26:35 AMGood potential projects are using better ways for marketing and promoting. Spamming with many messages all over the telegram or Twitter we only bother the community managers and moderator to ban those bot continuously Tbh, all altcoin projects spam and shill to some degree, some just have more money so they can buy Twitter and YT influencers while low level go for OP's "marketing" technique.

comments.author: Cryptodebjoe
comments.body: Organizing seminars and promotion in different social media  platforms is cool you can stretch it to your contacts and send them invites personally because due to the way the economy is many people are looking for alternative ways to make some extra cash.... And the crypto space offers such opportunities

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Rikafip on December 26, 2022, 04:06:28 PMThere is nothing new about what you are doing as I've seen it as early as 2017 during that ICO craze when each and every Telegram group was filled with similar spam and is as effective as ANN thread bumping that we can still see here. Either case, a total waste of money.I agree they may have upgraded or added new features but it's still the same spamming and shilling service those ICO back then are using, there's a big difference between shilling your project through bots and branding your project through natural means and people don't trust bots seeing a company promoted that way, we want real people talking about good projects because of their experiences on that project, one good testimonial is better than 100 shilling bots.
